comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06] We can only assume that this is the irrepressible Dr Bradfield exploring his creation!

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper] I think that's a fairly safe assumption.

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: "Skids" - they must have made the arch formwork and skidded it along those rails. Those arches are now well above the roadway with rock sides, so they must have then removed those rails and cut the rock down to form the roadway, or maybe those skid rails are just sitting on some fill..
